name: ROC Momentum Simple
description: Rate of Change momentum on high-beta stocks
rationale: Rate of Change (ROC) is the purest momentum indicator - it simply measures percentage price change over N days. ROC > 0 means price is higher than N days ago = positive momentum. This directly captures what made the manual strategies work: buying stocks with positive recent returns. The 21-day period (~1 month) balances signal responsiveness with noise reduction. High-beta stocks amplify this momentum signal. Simple and direct - no complex indicator combinations that overfit.
